Index of /public/ftp/pub/Linux/system/mail

../                      Parent directory
!INDEX.html              Long index format
biffs/                   programs to raise an alert when you have new mail
composers/               special-purpose mail composition programs
listservs/               software for managing mailing lists
mailhandlers/            various programs for handling mail
misc/                    miscellaneous filtering and massaging tools for mail
mta/                     mail transfer agents
mua/                     mail user agents (general-purpose mail reader/composer software)
pop/                     programs for remote mail service via POP or IMAP
qmail-unread-0.9.0.tar.gz displays a summary table of all unread mail for qmail users
